title: [聊天][Bungee]UChat——更简单使用的Json聊天[1.7-1.12]
author: never断念
txt_content:
本帖最后由 never断念 于 2018-2-2 12:56 编辑 


Ultimate Chat | 更简单使用的Json聊天·标记·等级
(使用PlaceHolderAPI具有50多个变量)
介绍:Ultimate Chat让你（服务器所有者）显示玩家姓名，部落标记，结婚标签和你选择创建的任何标签的附加信息，全部使用原我的世界JSON。 当你悬停在这个玩家的聊天上时,就将会显示玩家的信息。




预览效果:

在服务器中的玩家可以@你










插件特色:
                在使用PlaceHolderAPI时可以完全支持此插件的所有变量，例如在服务器自动发送的公告上面可以使用自定义的json （例如:命令 跳转的网站）,在使用Redis在同一个Redis服务器上的任意bukkit或Sponge服务器之间发送私人消息等（下面是作者剩下的原文,就是和各类插件的交互） /ubroadcasts and channel message between any server in bukkit or Sponge conected on same Redis server.?Can show tags of plugin tags made for LegendChat;?Use channels as command aliases;?Bungee bridge to chat messages between Bungee Network using as many channels you want.?Hook into vault to get prefixes, suffixes, money, group, and all info the Vault provides;?Hook with all chat plugin that uses "setFormat()" in his codes;?Show marry status, marry partner and marry name if using marry plugin;?Channel costs to chat;?Mention players. When a player write other player name on chat this player will be notified with a sound;?Show Clan info, KDR, name, tag, rank, etc;?Easy channel creation and personalization, by distance, world or all;?Show the item the player is on hand useing @Hand (default) on chat message;?Easy TAG creation and 100% customization of a tag;?Complete API to add tag, change the messages or cancel chat,allviaplugin.With javadocs too;?

使用方法:官方百科
命令:(未翻译大概能看懂 命令 权限节点 功能)
/tell {player} [message] - uchat.cmd.tell
To lock private messages with a player or send a message direct to player.
/r {message} - uchat.cmd.tell
To respond the last private message received.
/umsg {player} {message} - uchat.cmd.umsg
To send a message directo player without formats. Goot to use with other plugins to send clean system messages to players.
/ubroad {message} [hover:{message}] [click:{cmd}] [suggest:{msg or cmd}] - uchat.cmd.broadcast Send broadcast messages with optional hover message, click and suggest actions. You can change or add more aliases like /all on config file. On click: and suggest: you can use {clicked} to put the player name who clicked on command.
/chat clear - uchat.cmd.clear
To clear own chat messages (not for all players);
/chat clear-all - uchat.cmd.clear-all
To clear all players chat messages;
/chat spy - uchat.cmd.spy
To enable/Disable spy chat. This will spy the non global chats and all private messages.
/chat mute {player} [channel] - uchat.cmd.mute
To mute/unmute a player in all channels, or in a specific channel.
/chat ignore {channel/player} - uchat.cmd.ignore.player or uchat.cmd.ignore.channel
To ignore a channel or player and dont receive the channel/player messages.
/chat chconfig {channel} {key} {value} - uchat.cmd.chconfig
Edit a channel config. Use TAB to see available keys to edit.
/chat newchannel {channel-name} {alias} {color} - uchat.cmd.newchannel
Creates a new Channel.
/chat delchannel {channel-name} - uchat.cmd.delchannel
Deletes a Channel.
/chat reload - uchat.cmd.reload, uchat.admin_, OP or from console
Reload the config and language files.复制代码权限:默认权限:

这是所有玩家的默认权限，无需重新设置，但可以否定

Bukkit:
   uchat.player - Includes the following perms:
      uchat.cmd.ignore.player
      uchat.cmd.ignore.channel
      uchat.cant-ignore.local
      uchat.cmd.tell
      uchat.cmd.clear
      uchat.chat.click-urls
      uchat.channel.global.read
      uchat.channel.global.write
      uchat.channel.local.read
      uchat.channel.local.write
      uchat.password

Sponge:
      uchat.cmd.ignore.player
      uchat.cmd.ignore.channel
      uchat.cant-ignore.local
      uchat.cmd.tell
      uchat.cmd.clear
      uchat.chat.click-urls
      uchat.channel.global.read
      uchat.channel.global.write
      uchat.channel.local.read
      uchat.channel.local.write
      uchat.password
Commands:

uchat.cmd.tell
uchat.cmd.spy
uchat.cmd.umsg
uchat.cmd.broadcast
uchat.cmd.clear
uchat.cmd.clear-all
uchat.cmd.mute
uchat.cmd.ignore.channel
uchat.cmd.ignore.player
uchat.cmd.reload
Channels:

全局和本地通道的权限默认给予bukkit服务器上的所有玩家。
uchat.channel.<channel>.read
uchat.channel.<channel>.write
聊天相关:

uchat.cant-ignore.<player/channel> - This player/channel can't be ignored
uchat.chat.mention - To allow mention players on chat
uchat.chat.color - To allow use color codes on chat
uchat.chat.color.formats - To allow use italic, bold and other formats;
uchat.chat.color.magic - To allow use magic;
uchat.channel.admin - To allow use of channel admin (if exists)?
uchat.discord.mention - Allow player to send [url=home.php?mod=space&uid=408376]@Everyone[/url] and [url=home.php?mod=space&uid=259839]@here[/url] to discord (if enabled on channel)
私密聊天:

为了允许非操作者侦察消息，需要将命令许可和一个聊天间谍许可给予玩家/组。

uchat.cmd.spy - Command to enable/disable Spy. This permission only allow the command usage;
uchat.chat-spy.all - Spy all channels, players and private;
uchat.chat-spy.bypass - Don't allow your messages and privates to be spied (op by default);
uchat.chat-spy.private - Allow spy private messages;
uchat.chat-spy.<channel name> - Allow spy a channel;复制代码


Bungee安装:(机翻能看懂所以我也就没人翻)
您的玩家可以使用BungeeCord聊天消息作为正常频道。
把插件jar放到你的BungeeCord插件目录下;
现在你可以创建一个新的频道或使用一些现有的频道，并在频道文件上启用Bungee选项;
所有的信息将只发送到蹦极频道，而不是正常的聊天;
使用蹦极频道的权限与其他正常频道相同。 不需要特别的许可;

官方语言支持:
EN-US, PT-BR, FR-FR, FR-ES, HU-HU, RU, SP-ES, ZH-CN, KO-KR


插件下载地址:
              请前往原站下载,支持作者（下载地址）
其他:
如果对插件使用方法或其他地方有疑问或是要提建议，请在此贴留言!
如果你喜欢该插件，欢迎评分(评分人气是不扣你自己的人气的)
感觉排版不好看的在下面说我会修改的好看的QWQ








本插件转载自Spigotmc,作者:FabioZumbi12
